Name: Get-Language
Synopsis: Returns information about the installed languages on a device.

Name: Get-PreferredLanguage
Synopsis: Returns the current System Preferred Language.

Name: Get-SystemLanguage
Synopsis: Returns the current System Preferred Language.

Name: Set-PreferredLanguage
Synopsis: Sets the provided language as the System Preferred UI Language.

Name: Set-SystemLanguage
Synopsis: Sets the provided language as the System Preferred UI Language.

Name: Get-InstalledLanguage
Synopsis: Returns information about the installed languages on a device.

Name: Get-SystemPreferredUILanguage
Synopsis: Returns the current System Preferred Language.

Name: Install-Language
Synopsis: Installs a language onto a device.

Name: Set-SystemPreferredUILanguage
Synopsis: Sets the provided language as the System Preferred UI Language.

Name: Uninstall-Language
Synopsis: Uninstalls a language from a device.
